title: Cucumber, tomato and olive salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 1/2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 clove garlic, grated', '2 ripe medium plum tomatoes, chopped in chunks', '1 large cucumber, chopped in chunks', '6 - 10 black olives, chopped', '6 - 8 leaves of fresh basil, finely chopped', 'sea salt and black pepper to taste']
